Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“{Char Squall}! Сюда!”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“{Char Squall}! Over here!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Отлично выглядишь! Кхм...{Line} Так, посмотрим кто у тебя в команде...”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“I’ll be announcing the squad{Line} assignments for the exam now.{Line} Let’s see... You’ll be with...”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“{Char Zell} Динч.{Line} Довольно энергичный парнишка.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Zell Dincht.{Line} Quite a lively fellow.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Энергичный? Да у него же шило в заднице.{Line} Я могу сам выбрать членов отряда?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Lively? He’s just loud.{Line} Can’t I switch members?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Боюсь, это невозможно.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“I’m afraid that’s not possible.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Сюда, {Char Zell}!”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Over here, Zell!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Вау! Я с тобой?!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Whoa! I’m with you!?”

Monologue.Current: Zell{Line}“{Char Squall}, right? Nice to meetcha.”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“{Char Squall}, right? Nice to meetcha.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Ты тоже с {Char Seifer}ом на ножах?”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“You don’t get along with Seifer,{Line} do you?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Слышал, вы слегка{Line} повздорили этим утром...”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Heard he whooped you{Line} pretty bad this morning.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Мы не дрались.{Line} Это была тренировка.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“We weren’t fighting.{Line} We were training.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Спорим, что он так не думает?!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“I bet you he doesn’t{Line} think so.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“Он, конечно, редкостный урод...”{Next}“Но ты просто не обращай{Line} на него внимания!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“Look, Seifer’s just being{Line} a pain in the ass.”{Next}“All you have to do{Line} is ignore him.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Это тебя не касается.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“That’s none of your business.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“...не касается.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“None of your business.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Кхм... Извините, но...”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Ahem... Excuse me, but...”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“{Char Seifer}, о котором идёт речь...{Line} Лидер вашего отряда.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“That Seifer you’re talking about...{Line} He’s your squad leader.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Zell}{Line}“ЧЁ?!”
Monologue.Original: Zell{Line}“SAY WHAT!?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Это не обсуждается.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“It can’t be changed.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“{Char Seifer}! Ты здесь?”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Seifer! Are you here?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Ты - лидер отряда.{Line} Удачи вам.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“You’re the squad leader.{Line} Good luck to you.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Seifer}{Line}“Инструктор...”{Next}“Терпеть не могу, когда{Line} мне желают удачи.”
Monologue.Original: Seifer{Line}“...Instructor.”{Next}“I hate it when people{Line} wish me luck.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Seifer}{Line}“Приберегите её для тех,{Line} кто в ней нуждается.”
Monologue.Original: Seifer{Line}“Save those words for a{Line} bad student that needs them, eh?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Как скажешь.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Ok then.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Удачи, {Char Seifer}.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Good luck, Seifer.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Seifer}{Line}“Добавьте инструктора Трип в список.”
Monologue.Original: Seifer{Line}“Add Instructor Trepe to the list.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Как пожелаешь.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Well then.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Итак, все мы в отряде «Бета».{Line} Я - старший инструктор.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“You’re all assigned to Squad B.{Line} I’ll be the instructor in charge.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Не забывайте, что главным критерием{Line} оценки ваших результатов является{Line} работа в команде. Надеюсь, что все{Line} вы успешно сдадите экзамен!”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Teamwork is of the utmost importance.{Line} Let’s get through this exam, everyone!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Seifer}{Line}“А теперь слушайте меня.{Line} Работа в команде означает{Line} не путаться у меня под ногами.”{Next}“Это главное правило{Line} отряда «Бета».{Line} Не забудьте его!”
Monologue.Original: Seifer{Line}“Listen up! Teamwork means{Line} staying out of my way.”{Next}“It’s a Squad B rule.{Line} Don’t you forget it!”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“Все собрались?”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Everyone here?”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Well...”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Well...”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“This exam will involve{Line} 12 members from Squads A through D.”{Next}“You will be proceeding to{Line} a real battlefield.{Line} Obviously, the battle is real.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“This exam will involve{Line} 12 members from Squads A through D.”{Next}“You will be proceeding to{Line} a real battlefield.{Line} Obviously, the battle is real.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Life and death, victory and defeat,{Line} honor and disgrace...”{Next}“Each of these go hand in hand.{Line} There’s only one way or the other.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Life and death, victory and defeat,{Line} honor and disgrace...”{Next}“Each of these go hand in hand.{Line} There’s only one way or the other.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“How ’bout it?{Line} Are you still up for it?”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“How ’bout it?{Line} Are you still up for it?”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“You will be accompanied{Line} by 9 SeeD members.”{Next}“Should you fail, these members shall{Line} get the job done. They always do.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“You will be accompanied{Line} by 9 SeeD members.”{Next}“Should you fail, these members shall{Line} get the job done. They always do.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Well, that’s one less{Line} worry on your mind.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Well, that’s one less{Line} worry on your mind.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“The pride of Balamb Garden!{Line} The elite mercenary force, SeeD!”{Next}“Learn from them, obey their commands{Line} and accomplish the mission.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“The pride of Balamb Garden!{Line} The elite mercenary force, SeeD!”{Next}“Learn from them, obey their commands{Line} and accomplish the mission.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Prove yourself worthy{Line} of becoming a member of SeeD!”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Prove yourself worthy{Line} of becoming a member of SeeD!”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Best of luck.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Best of luck.”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“Нам бы очень пригодился{Line} мастер ганблейда...”{Next}“Надеюсь, что вы с {Char Seifer}ом{Line} успешно пройдёте испытание.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“We’ve yet to have a{Line} gunblade specialist in SeeD.”{Next}“That is why I am hoping{Line} you and Seifer{Line} will join us in SeeD.”

Monologue.Current: Директор Сид{Line}“Ступай.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Now go.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Quistis}{Line}“Выступаем!”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Let’s get a move-on!”

Monologue.Current: (Фудзин и Райдзин, как обычно,{Line} увязались следом... Весь{Line} дисциплинарный комитет в сборе.)
Monologue.Original: (Fujin and Raijin tagging along as usual...{Line} Guess that makes up the whole{Line} disciplinary committee.)

Monologue.Current: (В список?.. О чём он?..)
Monologue.Original: (The list...?{Line} What is it?)

Monologue.Current: Xu{Line}“Mission complete!{Line} I think we did a pretty good job.”{Next}“The candidates are{Line} back safely, right?”
Monologue.Original: Xu{Line}“Mission complete!{Line} I think we did a pretty good job.”{Next}“The candidates are{Line} back safely, right?”

Monologue.Current: Xu{Line}“Although we didn’t realize the{Line} {Term Galbadia}n Army was after the{Line} abandoned communication tower...”
Monologue.Original: Xu{Line}“Although we didn’t realize the{Line} {Term Galbadia}n Army was after the{Line} abandoned communication tower...”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“We’ve just received word from{Line} the {Term Dollet} Dukedom.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“We’ve just received word from{Line} the {Term Dollet} Dukedom.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“The {Term Galbadia}n Army has agreed to withdraw{Line} as long as the communication tower is{Line} repaired and the uplink remains operational.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“The {Term Galbadia}n Army has agreed to withdraw{Line} as long as the communication tower is{Line} repaired and the uplink remains operational.”

Monologue.Current: Xu{Line}“Well, in any case,{Line} {Term Galbadia} is out of there.”{Next}“We could’ve made more{Line} money if they’d stayed{Line} and caused more ruckus.”
Monologue.Original: Xu{Line}“Well, in any case,{Line} {Term Galbadia} is out of there.”{Next}“We could’ve made more{Line} money if they’d stayed{Line} and caused more ruckus.”

Monologue.Current: Xu{Line}“Hey, you did pretty well!”
Monologue.Original: Xu{Line}“Hey, you did pretty well!”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“Of course! He’s my best student.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“Of course! He’s my best student.”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“He’s not very social, though.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“He’s not very social, though.”

Monologue.Current: Quistis{Line}“The results for the exam should be{Line} announced soon. Just stick around here.”
Monologue.Original: Quistis{Line}“The results for the exam should be{Line} announced soon. Just stick around here.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“How did it feel out there on the battlefield?”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“How did it feel out there on the battlefield?”

Monologue.Current: Felt good{Line}Scared to death{Line}...Whatever
Monologue.Original: Felt good{Line}Scared to death{Line}...Whatever

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“To actually fight... It was a good feeling.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“To actually fight... It was a good feeling.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“That’s the spirit!{Line} But don’t let it go to your head.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“That’s the spirit!{Line} But don’t let it go to your head.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“I was so scared my knees were shaking.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“I was so scared my knees were shaking.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Well, that’s what it’s like at first.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Well, that’s what it’s like at first.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“...Whatever.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“...Whatever.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Whatever?”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Whatever?”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“That’s great!{Line} Whatever!”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“That’s great!{Line} Whatever!”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Well, I’m just glad{Line} nobody got hurt.”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Well, I’m just glad{Line} nobody got hurt.”
